content.query:
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://nyctaxisynapsedl.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-green-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    WITH(
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    )AS [result]

    CREATE DATABASE nyc_green_taxi_discovery;

    USE nyc_green_taxi_discovery;

    ALTER DATABASE nyc_green_taxi_discovery COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8;

    SELECT name,collation_name FROM sys.databases;



--create external data source
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_green_taxi_data_raw
WITH(
    LOCATION='https://nyctaxisynapsedl.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-green-taxi-data/raw'
)

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_green_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    WITH(
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    )AS [result]


Drop EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_green_taxi_data;

SELECT name,location from sys.external_data_sources;
